original: Udāna 5.1
analyzed: udāna

original: Piyatarasutta
analyzed: piyatara sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena rājā pasenadi kosalo mallikāya deviyā saddhiṁ uparipāsādavaragato hoti.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ mallikāya deviyā saddhim upari pāsāda vara gataḥ hoti

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo mallikaṁ deviṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ mallikam devim etat avoca

original: “atthi nu kho te, mallike, kocañño attanā piyataro”ti?
analyzed: atthi nu kho te mallike kocaññaḥ attanā piyatarā uti

original: “Natthi kho me, mahārāja, kocañño attanā piyataro.
analyzed: natthi kho me mahā rāja kocaññaḥ attanā piyataraḥ

original: Tuyhaṁ pana, mahārāja, atthañño koci attanā piyataro”ti?
analyzed: tuyham pana mahā rāja atthañño koci attanā piyataraḥ ti

original: “Mayhampi kho, mallike, natthañño koci attanā piyataro”ti.
analyzed: mayham pi kho mallike natthaññaḥ koci attanā piyataraḥ ti

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo pāsādā orohitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: atha khalu rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ pāsādāḥ orohitvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo
analyzed: bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ

original: bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, mallikāya deviyā saddhiṁ uparipāsādavaragato mallikaṁ deviṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: idha āha bhante mallikāya deviyā saddhim upari pāsāda vara gataḥ mallikam devim etat avoca

original: ‘atthi nu kho te, mallike, kocañño attanā piyataro’ti?
analyzed: atthi nu kho te mallike kocaññaḥ attanā piyatarā uti

original: Evaṁ vutte, mallikā devī maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte mallikā devī mam etat avoca

original: ‘natthi kho me, mahārāja, kocañño attanā piyataro.
analyzed: natthi kho me mahā rāja kocaññaḥ attanā piyataraḥ

original: Tuyhaṁ pana, mahārāja, atthañño koci attanā piyataro’ti?
analyzed: tuyham pana mahā rāja atthañño koci attanā piyataraḥ ti

original: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, mallikaṁ deviṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte aha bhante mallikam devim etat avoca

original: ‘mayhampi kho, mallike, natthañño koci attanā piyataro’”ti.
analyzed: mayham pi kho mallike natthaññaḥ koci attanā piyataraḥ ti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi

original: “Sabbā disā anuparigamma cetasā,
analyzed: sabbāḥ disāḥ anuparigamma cetasā

original: Nevajjhagā piyataramattanā kvaci;
analyzed: piyatara mattanā kvaci

original: Evaṁ piyo puthu attā paresaṁ,
analyzed: evam piyaḥ puthu attā paresa

original: Tasmā na hiṁse paramattakāmo”ti.
analyzed: tasmai na hise paramatta kāmā uti

original: Paṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: paṭhama
